txt.en: Two leaders of the Kindred stand ready to fight!
Chapter 18.5: Catching Sparks
Check if there are any messages atop the stairs on the left side of the entrance to the refuge
Can bloodshed be avoided?
Talk to Nakûr in the entrance to the refuge

Return to the entrance of the refuge and learn what has happened

With the heroes imprisoned, it falls to Daxamat to take up the struggle!\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>Daxamat's Refuge is just west of the Waterway Market in Umbar Baharbêl, behind an unassuming door.</rgb>
Birûk was due to arrive sometime soon. You should go down to the cellar and see if the Temámir has returned.
Spread out the papers on the table in the planning room
'TBD - Blah!'

The last time Nakûr checked there were no messages, but perhaps now there will be. If so, the shopkeeper will have slipped them under the door at the top of the stairs on the left side of the entrance to the refuge.
Nakûr will be pleased to see the arrival of these new messages.
Something has happened by the entrance to the refuge. You hear the sound of voices raised in anger!
'TBD - Blah!'
You should spread out the papers on the table in the planning room to the right of the entrance to the refuge.
Two leaders of the Kindred of the Coins stand ready to fight!
Rothog the Storm stares at you carefully.
Shêsha and her cat Rûmina study the papers in the planning room.
You heave a sigh of relief as everyone lowers their weapons
Kinsman Belondor appraises you.
'TBD - Blah!'
You hear voices from above... voices raised in anger!
